import React, {Fragment, useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagra } = formData; return (

onSubmit(e)} >
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for

onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
